H0.text: Which unit of the Roman army was one tenth of a legion. Maniple

H1.text: Which unit of the Roman army was one tenth of a legion. Centuria

H2.text: Which unit of the Roman army was one tenth of a legion. Turma

H3.text: Which unit of the Roman army was one tenth of a legion. Cohort

A4.text: During much of the republican era, a legion was divided into three lines, each of ten maniples.

A5.text: In the late Republic and much of the imperial period (from about 100 BC), a legion was divided into ten cohorts.

A6.text: Maniple (military unit), a division of a Roman legion
